licenseNote: The license status indicates whether PRO features are accessible. In the absence of an internet connection during the license verification process, the status will be set to false, even if you are enrolled in the PRO tier.
enterLicenseKeyDescription: You can find your license key in Gumroad page or the email inbox you filled in during purchase.
activateSuccess: You have activate your license successfully.
activateInvalid: The provided license key is invalid.
offlineNotification: You are offline. Please check your internet connection before procceed license verification.
supportAndSubscriptionInfoAnswer: Your subscription and payment information will be securely managed by Gumroad. If you have any questions regarding your subscription, please feel free to contact support@gumroad.com via email. For support related to this plugin, please contact contact@hsiehchengyi.com via email.
howRecurringPaymentsWorkAnswer: You will receive an email receipt from Gumroad every month or year, depending on your subscription plan. Each receipt will include detailed payment information and links to manage your subscription settings, such as updating your plan or canceling the subscription entirely.
freeUsersNeedToWait: Free users need to wait $TIME_REMAINING$ seconds before proceeding. Consider upgrading to skip waiting.

freePlanDesc: Eligible for access to all features, with waiting delays and branding included.
eraseLicenseDesc:
After the license is erased from this device, Pro features will no longer be available here.
 
 Don't worry, the license key itself remains valid and you can restore Pro access on this device at any time by re-entering your license key.
